name: @apollo/react-common
readme: # ## React Apollo - Common [![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/%40apollo%2Freact-common.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/js/%40apollo%2Freact-common) [![Build Status](https://circleci.com/gh/apollographql/react-apollo.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/apollographql/react-apollo) [![Join the community on Spectrum](https://withspectrum.github.io/badge/badge.svg)](https://spectrum.chat/apollo) React Apollo common types and helper utilities. ### Installation ``` npm install @apollo/react-common ``` ### Documentation All Apollo Client documentation, including React Apollo usage articles and helpful recipes, lives on [https://www.apollographql.com/docs/react/](https://www.apollographql.com/docs/react/) For the React Apollo API reference, visit [https://www.apollographql.com/docs/react/api/react-apollo.html](https://www.apollographql.com/docs/react/api/react-apollo.html)

scripts.test:cjs: npm run build && npx jest --config ../../config/jest.cjs.config.js --testPathPattern packages/common
scripts.test:umd: npm run build && npx jest --config ../../config/jest.umd.config.js --testPathPattern packages/common
